modules.description: This module provides operations to access the name, description, and default value of a recipe parameter, along with a function to print its human-readable representation. It works with the abstract type `Bap_recipe.param`, representing individual parameters in a recipe. Concrete use cases include inspecting and displaying parameter metadata when configuring or documenting build recipes.

This module loads and processes recipe files, enabling tasks to be executed with structured parameters and commands. It handles locating recipes, parsing metadata like descriptions and parameters, and building executable command lines. The core functionality works with the `Bap_recipe.param` type, allowing inspection of parameter names, descriptions, and default values. For example, it can load a recipe by name, display its configurable options, and generate a command vector for invocation.
